p: The effect of marjoram EO, chitosan, and AA application on fresh-cut lettuce during the preliminary screening is shown in Figure 1 and Figure S2. During storage, EO application (1:1500) reduced and AA of 0.5% accelerated weight loss after 2 days compared with the control treatment ( Figure S2). Following 6 days of storage, EO application (1:1500) and chitosan of 0.125% reveled lower weight losses while all the other applications had same weight losses as the control treatment.
